oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic grapes - More than Wine and Statistics
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Geier, Bernward
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Viticulture
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The chapter presents inforamtion on the status of organic viticulture world wide and also includes a global organic wine statistics (hectares per country; not all wine producing countries covered though).
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: International Federation of Organic Agriculture Movements (IFOAM), Bonn, Germany
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Geier, Bernward (2006) Organic grapes - More than Wine and Statistics. In: Willer, Helga and Yussefi, Minou (Eds.) The World of Organic Agriculture. International Federation of Organic Agriculture Movements (IFOAM), Bonn, Germany, chapter 7.4, pp. 62-65.
